name: Grecks
descriptions: Grecks is a lazy-eyed ghoul living in Freeside in 2281.

Grecks can be found in the north east of Freeside, and is easily recognized by his lazy eye. He has a history of gambling and drinking, and does not like to pay his debts. According to him, he got his lazy eye from an incident with a "scum-humping water baron."
Grecks was written by area designer Robert Lee. Although some other characters around Freeside's exterior were cut for performance reasons, Grecks was kept due to his quest importance.

topics.response_text: Hey man, can you spare a few caps?

topics.topic_text: Are you the Grecks who owes the Garrets?
topics.response_text: That all depends on who's asking.

topics.topic_text: Sure, man. Here you go. <Punch Grecks in the face>
topics.response_text: Ow! What the hell was that for?!

topics.topic_text: Your hangman, if you don't start being straight with me.
topics.response_text: Whoa, yeah. I guess the Garrets sent you after me? Look, I've got the caps right here, just don't hurt me.

topics.topic_text: You owe the Garrets a good lump of caps. I'm here to collect.
topics.response_text: Ah crap. I was hoping they'd forget about my tab. Look, I've got the caps right here, just don't hurt me.
Interest?! The Garrets said nothing about interest on their tabs. Look man, I've got the caps right here, just don't hurt me.

topics.topic_text: You don't cheat the Garrets and walk away. Cough up the rest or you're rat bait.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Okay! Here. That's everything I've got except the clothes on my back. I'm sorry about this.

topics.topic_text: That'll do. Mess with the Garrets again and you're dead.
topics.response_text: I won't. Thanks for not killing me.

topics.topic_text: Thanks for the caps, now enjoy the zombie afterlife.
Heh, I think I'll make an example of you. Give me your clothes, or you get dead.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Anything, take it! Just don't kill me, man!
What? Thank you Mr. Obvious. I haven't heard that in a while.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, and your eye! That shit is hilarious!
topics.response_text: <Twitches> My eye? A scum-humping water baron did this to me. No one talks trash about my eye.

topics.topic_text: Seriously zombie, are you looking at me or someone off that direction?!
topics.response_text: That's it! No one insults the eye!

topics.topic_text: Oh, by the way. That damn eye of yours is creepy. Get it checked out.
topics.response_text: <Twitches> A scum-humping water baron did this to me. No one trash-talks the eye.

conversation.response_text: Those rat-bastard Garrets stopped offering tabs.  Now where the hell am I supposed to go for free drinks?
